BotWelcomeMessage:
Welcome to the DavinciJ15 token checker bot.

If you know how to sign a message, then sign the following message: "I have DJ15 Tokens at <Your Ethereum Address>"

NOTE: The signed message must be without quotes and must not include the < or > symbols in your message. Once that is done, please send a private message to this bot with the following:"I have DJ15 Tokens at <Your Ethereum Address>"<signature>
